title: Add a new final page with “this is where it all started” and include newly uploaded images as static assets

requirements.text: Add a new final (last) route/page to the site and display the text exactly: "this is where it all started".

quotes: And now add one more page at the last and say  " this is where it all started"

acceptanceCriteria: A new page component exists and is reachable via a new route (after the current /gallery page).
The page visibly displays the text exactly: "this is where it all started" (matching capitalization and spacing inside the quotes).
The new page inherits the existing Valentine theme styling and layout consistency (header/footer/transition overlay behavior unchanged).

requirements.text: Update the router and all navigation controls so the new final page is included in: (1) the top navigation, and (2) the bottom sequential pager order, with the new page being the last step.

quotes: add one more page at the last

acceptanceCriteria: Top navigation includes an entry to the new final page, and clicking it navigates correctly.
Sequential pager includes the new final page as the last entry; Next from /gallery goes to the new page; Previous from the new page goes back to /gallery.
The page-to-page transition overlay continues to play when navigating to/from the new final page.

requirements.text: Add the newly uploaded images as frontend static assets under frontend/public/assets/uploads and (at minimum) ensure they can be referenced by filename from the frontend code without using the backend: 1771025953219.png, 1771025927131.png, 1771025946100.png, 1771025953219-1.png, 1771025946100-1.png, 1771025953219-2.png, 1771025946100-2.png, 1771025927131-1.png, 1771025927131-2.png, 1771025145088.png, 1771025145088-1.png.
acceptanceCriteria: All listed PNG files exist in frontend/public/assets/uploads in the built app output (deduplicate the repeated 1771025145088-1.png filename without breaking references).
The images load successfully in the browser when referenced via /assets/uploads/<filename>.
No backend endpoints are added/used to serve these images.

requirements.text: On the new final page, include a simple responsive gallery (or equivalent visual presentation) that displays the newly uploaded PNG images so the user can confirm the pictures are visible.

quotes: And now add one more page at the last and say  " this is where it all started"

acceptanceCriteria: The new final page renders a gallery/grid of the newly uploaded PNG images using their /assets/uploads/<filename> paths.
Images are viewable on mobile and desktop without layout overflow.
At least one interaction path (e.g., click to enlarge if using existing lightbox) works without errors.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui) must not be edited.
Keep backend as a single Motoko actor; do not add backend image serving.
Use English for any user-facing text in the build request and ensure the displayed page text matches exactly: "this is where it all started".
nonGoals: Do not change the existing Page 1–4 messages, image assignments, or galleries except as needed to include navigation to the new final page.
Do not implement sound effects for transitions (not requested).
Do not add authentication or any new backend features for this change.
